description: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files. It allows developers to create new diagrams and work with VSD, VSDX, VSTX, VSSX, VSS, VST, VSX, VTX, VDW and VDX files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the diagram, from lines and fills, to more complex elements, and then export to VDX, VSX,VSDX,VSSX,VSTX, VTX, XPS, HTML, SVG, SWF, XAML, image or PDF formats.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements,task and bug fixes as detailed below:
   
   Enhancements 
   DIAGRAMNET-51204-Printer paper size is changed after diagram saving
   DIAGRAMNET-51230-Incorrect values of page margins
   DIAGRAMNET-51274-Add support of inserting comments on the shape level   
   DIAGRAMNET-51297-Input VDX - incorrect reading of SolutionXML
     
    Bugs  

   DIAGRAMNET-51061-Missing shapes on converting a VST to PNG
   DIAGRAMNET-51262-Displaced text items on converting a VSDM to SVG
   DIAGRAMNET-51276-VSD to SVG - all icons are not visible properly
   DIAGRAMNET-51277-VSDM to SVG - Missing shadow of shapes
   DIAGRAMNET-51279-A missing character on converting a VSD to PDF
   DIAGRAMNET-51282-Some vdx file are corrupted after saving
   DIAGRAMNET-51284-DiagramException occurs on vsdx file loading   
   DIAGRAMNET-51285-VSD to PNG - all text items are missing
   DIAGRAMNET-51286-VSD to PNG - the partial rendering of a shape
   DIAGRAMNET-51288-Invalid color value error on converting a VSDX to PNG
   DIAGRAMNET-51289-The page level comments icon does not display text
   DIAGRAMNET-51290-Aspose.Diagram bug in method SetWidth
   DIAGRAMNET-51291-Output VSDX - incorrect layout when setting the connecting lines straight
   DIAGRAMNET-51292-Output VSDX - the text item of connecting lines is misplaced
   DIAGRAMNET-51293-VSDX to SVG - an additional mark appears along with shapes
   DIAGRAMNET-51294-VSDM to SVG - an additional mark appears along with shapes
summary: Aspose.Diagram is a class library for working with Microsoft Visio files.
title: Aspose.Diagram for .NET
